sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_1856ac9fdbfd401061aecd3f2996197e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition><![CDATA[checkTriggerCondition4554534();

function checkTriggerCondition4554534() {
    try {
        //this means that the integration switch is ON. this variable is checked in all functions
        var switch_value = gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.non_prod_us_deployment_on_switch');

        if (switch_value != undefined && switch_value != null && switch_value != '') {
            if (switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == 'true' || switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == true) {

                //determine which instance is production so that the scripts do not run accidentally in a non-prod environment
                if (gs.getProperty('instance_name').toString() == gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.service_guru_orchestrator_instance').toString()) {
                    return true;
                } else {
                    return false;
                }

            } else {
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><name>ServiceGuru - Send emails</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 02:00:00</run_period><run_start>2019-09-10 04:00:00</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:05:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[updateSetAutoDeployJob54543454();

function updateSetAutoDeployJob54543454() {

    try {
        var obj = new service_guru_us_helper_scoped();
        obj.sendEmails();

    } catch (e) {
        obj.info("Job sys id '1856ac9fdbfd401061aecd3f2996197e'. \nError in job function updateSetAutoDeployJob54543454:" + e);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-23 15:56:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>1856ac9fdbfd401061aecd3f2996197e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceGuru - Send emails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru" source="x_7756_update_set">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_1856ac9fdbfd401061aecd3f2996197e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-31 15:07:12</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_b5adc770078e401093b9f0269c1ed049
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition><![CDATA[checkTriggerCondition4554534();

function checkTriggerCondition4554534() {
    try {
        //this means that the integration switch is ON. this variable is checked in all functions
        var switch_value = gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.non_prod_us_deployment_on_switch');

        if (switch_value != undefined && switch_value != null && switch_value != '') {
            if (switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == 'true' || switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == true) {

                //determine which instance is production so that the scripts do not run accidentally in a non-prod environment
                if (gs.getProperty('instance_name').toString() == gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.service_guru_orchestrator_instance').toString()) {
                    return true;
                } else {
                    return false;
                }

            } else {
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><name>ServiceGuru - Check application versions in all environments</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-02 00:00:00</run_period><run_start>2019-09-10 21:24:21</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:05:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[updateSetAutoDeployJob5454544534();

function updateSetAutoDeployJob5454544534() {

    try {
        var obj = new service_guru_us_helper_scoped();
        obj.checkVersions();
 
    } catch (e) {
        obj.info("Job sys id 'b5adc770078e401093b9f0269c1ed049'. \nError in job function updateSetAutoDeployJob5454544534:" + e);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-28 19:58:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>b5adc770078e401093b9f0269c1ed049</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceGuru - Check application versions in all environments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru" source="x_7756_update_set">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_b5adc770078e401093b9f0269c1ed049</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-31 15:07:12</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition><![CDATA[checkTriggerCondition4554534();

function checkTriggerCondition4554534() {
    try {
        //this means that the integration switch is ON. this variable is checked in all functions
        var switch_value = gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.non_prod_us_deployment_on_switch');

        if (switch_value != undefined && switch_value != null && switch_value != '') {
            if (switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == 'true' || switch_value.toString().toLowerCase() == true) {

                //determine which instance is production so that the scripts do not run accidentally in a non-prod environment
                if (gs.getProperty('instance_name').toString() == gs.getProperty('x_7756_update_set.service_guru_orchestrator_instance').toString()) {
                    return true;
                } else {
                    return false;
                }

            } else {
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><name>ServiceGuru - Auto Update Set and Code Promotion</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:10:00</run_period><run_start>2019-09-10 04:00:00</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:05:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[updateSetAutoDeployJob545454();

function updateSetAutoDeployJob545454() {

    try {
        var obj = new service_guru_us_helper_scoped();
        obj.load();

    } catch (e) {
        obj.info("Job sys id '9535f0924ff40810ff6ab8de9310c7fe'. \nError in job function updateSetAutoDeployJob545454:" + e);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rshetty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-31 21:24:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>9535f0924ff40810ff6ab8de9310c7fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>154</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceGuru - Auto Update Set and Code Promotion</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru" source="x_7756_update_set">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_9535f0924ff40810ff6ab8de9310c7fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-31 15:07:12</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <choices>manual,smart_accept,skip_all,accept_all</choices> <description> Choose the mode of dealing with when Warnings and Errors occur. Any changes to this property would be across all environments and you cannot pick and choose different behavior for different Releases. In Manual mode, the errors and warnings will have to be resolved manually by the developers and the tool will wait till it no longer sees any Warnings or Errors. In 'Smart Accept' mode, similar to manual mode, the errors and warnings need to be resolved by the developers based on their first occurence. For subsequent instances, the tool will be accept/skip based on the decisions made in the previous environment if the same kind of collison is found. 'Skip all' would ignore all errors and warnings. 'Accept all' would accept all errors and warnings irrespective of the type of errors and warnings.</description> <ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache> <is_private>false</is_private> <name>x_7756_update_set.non_prod_us_deployment_error_acceptance_mode</name> <read_roles/> <suffix>non_prod_us_deployment_error_acceptance_mode</suffix> <sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>rshetty</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-12-08 22:04:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b4aaece64fe9c810ff6ab8de9310c719</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>x_7756_update_set.non_prod_us_deployment_error_acceptance_mode</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru" source="x_7756_update_set">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Auto Deployment - ServiceGuru">870d48164fb00810ff6ab8de9310c78e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_properties_b4aaece64fe9c810ff6ab8de9310c719</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>service_guru_ravish</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-12-28 21:39:47</sys_updated_on> <type>choicelist</type> <value>manual</value> <write_roles/> </sys_properties></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <choices/> <description>Enter the instance which will orchestrate all the commits. Ideally, this would be the production instance but it can also be a non-prod instance.
